theoria.theory.basic_crafting.title: Basic Crafting
theoria.theory.basic_crafting.subtitle: A humble beginning.
theoria.theory.basic_crafting.descriptio: Learn to use the Crafting Table to combine simple materials into more complex items. This is the cornerstone of all invention.
theoria.theory.smelting.title: Smelting
theoria.theory.smelting.subtitle: Harnessing the heat.
theoria.theory.smelting.description: Discover how to build and use a Furnace to cook food and refine raw ores into usable metals. Requires Basic Crafting.
theoria.theory.iron_smelting.title: Iron Age
theoria.theory.iron_smelting.subtitle: The first true metal.
theoria.theory.iron_smelting.description: Smelt your first Iron Ore to obtain Iron Ingots. This opens the door to durable tools and armor. Requires Smelting.
theoria.theory.basic_farming.title: Cultivation
theoria.theory.basic_farming.subtitle: Turning dirt into sustenance.
theoria.theory.basic_farming.description: Craft a Hoe and learn to till the earth, preparing the land for planting crops. Essential for self-sufficiency. Requires Basic Crafting.
theoria.theory.animal_breeding.title: Animal Husbandry
theoria.theory.animal_breeding.subtitle: Multiplying your resources.
theoria.theory.animal_breeding.descripti: Use harvested crops (like Wheat) to feed and breed passive mobs, securing a renewable source of food and materials. Requires Cultivation.
